name: descendant
title: Descendant Selector ("ancestor descendant")
desc: Selects all elements that are descendants of a given ancestor.

argument.desc: A selector to filter the descendant elements.
argument.name: descendant

examples.desc: Mark all inputs that are descendants of a form with a dotted blue border. Give a yellow background to inputs that are descendants of a fieldset that is a descendant of a form.
examples.html:
Form is surrounded by the green border.
Sibling to form:

entries.longdesc: A descendant of an element could be a child, grandchild, great-grandchild, and so on, of that element.
